title: Are you doing  something about the Thresh with 6 Sapphire Crystals that is AFKing in  my base?
body: Or are you gonna let him ruin more matches?

replies.body:
That sort of blatant afk/feed gets picked up pretty fast.

For your consideration: https://i.imgur.com/kOQpoqg.jpg
He might get a low priority que but... thats about it.
only saying the n word gets you banned because riot only cares about blacks
saying "ez" and "worth" also gets you perm ban btw
tru am black but idc if people say the n word riot is going downhill
its only a racist slur because you think its a racist slur actually nothing is a racial slur
